title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 May 2024, Farioli was appointed head coach of Dutch club Ajax, signing a three-year contract and becoming the club's first Italian manager.

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: The Italian studied philosophy before entering the world of football. He began his career as a goalkeeping coach under Roberto De Zerbi and took his first steps as a head coach in Turkey at the age of thirty.

title: Ajax appoint Francesco Farioli as new head coach - ESPN
snippet: Farioli had previously held jobs at Turkish clubs Fatih Karagumruk and Alanyaspor before joining Nice at the start of the 2023-24 season. He inherits an Ajax side that finished fifth in the Eredivisie -- their lowest finish since the 1999-2000 ...

title: Francesco Farioli: Football's philosopher
snippet: The Italian studied philosophy before entering the world of football. He began his career as a goalkeeping coach under Roberto De Zerbi and took his first steps as a head coach in Turkey at the age of thirty.

title: The Tactical Evolution of Ajax Amsterdam Under Francesco Farioli — Ajax Daily
snippet: When he accepted Ajax Amsterdam’s ... Francesco Farioli came to Ajax after the team gathered dangerous sixth place in 2023–24 leading to relegation worries through their inconsistent results....
